mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( itemId, imgUrl, itemName, itemPrice, itemPriceGST, slab1Discount, slab1Start, slab1End, slab2Discount, slab2Start, slab2End, slab3Discount, slab3Start, slab3End, brandId,categoryId ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{imgUrl}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemPriceGST}, #{slab_1_discount}, #{slab_1_start}, #{slab_1_end}, #{slab_2_discount}, #{slab_2_start}, #{slab_2_end}, #{slab_3_discount}, #{slab_3_start}, #{slab_3_end}, #{brandId},#{categoryId} )
